![Sheabree 072522 03.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/b1631f_183dce05a2fa4555bf6fffe100cafcf8~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_344,h_516,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Sheabree%20072522%2003.jpg)

Sheabree came to Childress in 2016 as the Mashburn Event Center Director and has been an employee of the CMDD since October 2018, when management of the event center was turned over to the CMDD.  For the last year she has mentored with Doc Smith learning the objectives of the CMDD and the role of the Executive Director.  Sheabree will continue to be responsible for the overall operations of the event center.

Executive Director
